typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		TripNo as string,
		ParentDateStamp as string,
		ParentLineTimeStamp as string,
		sysCreated as string,
		sysModified as string,
		Amount as string,
		Code as string,
		DateStamp as string,
		Description as string,
		InPackage as string,
		InvoiceCode as string,
		LineNo as string,
		LineTimeStamp as string,
		LineType as string,
		LocationCode as string,
		Qty as string,
		Status as string,
		Tax1 as string,
		Tax2 as string,
		Tax3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(deleteIf(Code!='')) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID as string,
		TripNo as string,
		ParentDateStamp as string,
		ParentLineTimeStamp as string,
		sysCreated as string,
		sysModified as string,
		Amount as string,
		Code as string,
		DateStamp as string,
		Description as string,
		InPackage as string,
		InvoiceCode as string,
		LineNo as string,
		LineTimeStamp as string,
		LineType as string,
		LocationCode as string,
		Qty as string,
		Status as string,
		Tax1 as string,
		Tax2 as string,
		Tax3 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
